item.title: Blog series on the topic of "light"
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: Just right for the beginning of the dark season: One focus of the last year (2024) has been the topic of “light”. Starting with the historical 3D images in Vintage Reality to first attempts with Photogrammetry to HDR.
